de.aikiit.bildbearbeiter.image
Class CreationDateFromExifImageRenamer

java.lang.Object
  de.aikiit.bildbearbeiter.image.AbstractImageRenamer
      de.aikiit.bildbearbeiter.image.CreationDateFromExifImageRenamer
All Implemented Interfaces:
Runnable
public class CreationDateFromExifImageRenamer
extends AbstractImageRenamer

This class transforms picture file names. All relevant files in the target directory get a new file name - if correct metadata can be extracted from the files' EXIF file headers.
A picture foo.jpg is renamed to 201108111100_foo.jpg if the picture's creation date was 2011-08-11 11:00.
Files with no exif metadata are not changed at all.

Version:
2011-06-02, 13:22
Author:
hirsch
